name: Sugar_Roots_Test
description:
Important: Click R if the background has disappeared to restart the level (that should fix it and any other bugs).

Only Works on Chrome

Welcome to sugar roots, master your way through 6 challenging levels. I hope you enjoy my first ever game on itch. And this game was submitted to the beginner's circle Jam #2. Enjoy

This game was made in the Godot game engine

The font I used was made by https://jotson.itch.io/

Here is the link to the font: https://jotson.itch.io/gravity-pixel-font

Be warned, the downloadable versions work better and the game has a few bugs(sometime the back ground doesn't load or the masking system stops, just die and it should fix itself.
